bibl.title: How Long and Old is the Codex of which P. Oxy. 1353 is a Leaf?

series.title: Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity.

bibl.title: Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon

bibl.seg: Barker Don, How Long and Old is the Codex of which P. Oxy. 1353 is a Leaf?

Craig A. Evans and H. Daniel Zacharias (Edd.), Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon = Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity. 13 = Library of Second Temple Studies. 70 (London, 2009) pp. 192-202, 13 figg., 2 tabl.
